title: Poolside - serif - font ID
content:
Looking for a font ID on this retro looking serif.

Many thanks in advance for any help/suggestions,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063654im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-01-22%20at%201_4156.39.36%20PM.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2015-01-22 at 1.39.36 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063654/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-01-22%20at%201.39.36%20PM.png) | 140.15 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
It’s Bernase Roman, but the only digital version I know of is by the now defunct Image Club Graphics:  
 [http://fontsinuse.com/typefaces/31979/itc-bernase-roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063654/http:/fontsinuse.com/typefaces/31979/itc-bernase-roman "http://fontsinuse.com/typefaces/31979/itc-bernase-roman")
